anya-e0401n8:33_70: tasmiṁ kālaṅkate so brāhmaṇo idha sakadāgāmibhāvaṁ patvā tusitākāyaṁ upapannoti evaṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_71: tassa yaṁ sakadāgāmittaṁ bhagavatā byākataṁ. ‘‘Adhigamavasenā’’ti sakadāgāmibhāvaṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_72: paṭilābhavasena. Na pana abrahmacārino sato adhigamavasenāti adhippāyo. Maraṇāsannakālepi
anya-e0401n8:33_73: hi sikkhāpadādhiṭṭhānena saha uparimaggaphalādhigamanaṁ nāma tikkhapaññassa ariyasāvakassa
anya-e0401n8:33_74: na dukkaranti. Etena kesañci theravādarocanaṁ paṭikkhittaṁ hoti. ‘‘Sakiṁdeva imaṁlokaṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_75: āgantvā’’ti etena ito paralokaṁ gamanassa ca tato puna idhāgamanassa ca siddhattā
anya-e0401n8:33_76: ayaṁ puggalo suddhena magganiyāmena kāmabhave dvikkhattu paramonāma hotīti siddho.
anya-e0401n8:33_77: Kathaṁ. Idha patvā tattha nibbattitvā idha parinibbāyī, tattha patvā idha nibbattitvā
anya-e0401n8:33_78: tattha parinibbāyīti. Sesāpana cattāro vipassanāniyāmena siddhā hontīti viññāyati.
anya-e0401n8:33_79: Katame cattāro. Idha patvā idha parinibbāyī. Tattha patvā tattha parinibbāyī. Idha
anya-e0401n8:33_80: patvā tattha parinibbāyī. Tattha patvā idha parinibbāyīti. Ettha ca tīsu sotāpannesu
anya-e0401n8:33_81: ekosattakkhattu paramo eva magganiyāmena siddho. Sesā pana dve sotāpannā vipassanāniyāmena
anya-e0401n8:33_82: siddhā. Cha sakadāgāmīsu dve eva magganiyāmena siddhā. Sesā pana cattāro vipassanāniyāmena
anya-e0401n8:33_83: siddhā. Tattha maggasiddhesu sotāpanna sakadāgāmīsu saṅkaro natthi. Vipassanāsiddhesu
anya-e0401n8:33_84: pana saṅkaro atthi. Atthato aviruddhe sati, vohāramattena saṅkare doso natthīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_85: Āgantvāti pāṭhavasena āgamanatoti vuttaṁ. Āgantāti pana pāṭho yutto. Āgamanasīlo
anya-e0401n8:33_86: āgamana dhammo hutvā sakadāgāmī nāmāti attho. Anāgantvā itthattanti etthapi esevanayo.
anya-e0401n8:33_87: Arahato bhāvo arahattaṁ. Arahatta maggaṁ. Dakkhiṇāya vipattikarānāma appapphala appānisaṁsakarā.
anya-e0401n8:33_88: Sampattikarā nāma mahapphala mahānisaṁsakarā. Sīlakkhandhādiguṇā nāma sīlakkhandha
anya-e0401n8:33_90: dakkhiṇāraha puggalesu. ‘‘Dhuraṁ’’ti padhānasīsaṭṭhāniyaṁ vuccati. Saddhā eva dhuraṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_91: assāti saddhādhuro. Evaṁ paññādhuro. Kasmā panettha vīriyadhuro na gahitoti. Pāḷiyaṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_92: saddhāvāhī maggaṁ bhāveti, paññāvāhī maggaṁ bhāvetīti vuttaṁ. Na pana vuttaṁ vīriyavāhī
anya-e0401n8:33_93: maggaṁ bhāvetīti. Tasmā na gahitoti. Kasmā pana vīriyavāhī maggaṁ bhāvetīti na vuttanti.
anya-e0401n8:33_94: Vuccate. Maggaṁ bhāventassa nāma ādimhi diṭṭhivicikicchānaṁ pahānāya kammaṁ mahantaṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_95: hoti. Kasmā, apāyamūlakattā. Tattha saddhā ca vicikicchā ca dve ujuppaṭipakkhā honti.
anya-e0401n8:33_96: Yasmiṁ ārammaṇe saddhā nivisati, tasmiṁ vicikicchā natthi. Yasmiṁ vicikicchā nivisati,
anya-e0401n8:33_97: tasmiṁ saddhā natthi. Tathā paññādiṭṭhiyo ca ujuppaṭipakkhā. Yattha paññā, na tattha
anya-e0401n8:33_98: diṭṭhi. Yattha diṭṭhi, na tattha paññāti. Api ca saddhā attano visaye diṭṭhiṁ vidhamatiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:33_99: Paññāya vicikicchāvidhamane vattabbameva natthi. Tasmā āraddha vipassako aniccādīsu
anya-e0401n8:33_101: pasīditvā saddhāvimuttabhāvañca pāpuṇāti. Paññāya aniccādīni nijjhānakkhamaṁ katvā
anya-e0401n8:33_102: dhammānusāribhāvañca suṭṭhutaraṁ passitvā diṭṭhipattapaññā vimuttabhāvañca pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0401n8:33_103: Vīriyaṁ pana diṭṭhivicikicchānaṁ paṭipakkhamattampi na hoti. Atha kho tāsaṁ sahāyopi
anya-e0401n8:33_104: hoti, dhurabhūtañca. Paggahalakkhaṇañhi vīriyaṁ. Taṁ saddhaṁpi paggaṇhāti, paññaṁpi
anya-e0401n8:33_105: paggaṇhāti, diṭṭhiṁpi paggaṇhāti, vicikicchampi paggaṇhātiyeva. Kutopana attano sabhāvena
anya-e0401n8:33_106: diṭṭhivicikicchāyo pajahituṁ sakkhissati. Tasmā imasmiṁ ṭhāne vīriyavāhīti ca vīriyadhuroti
anya-e0401n8:33_107: ca na vuttoti. Kāyasakkhimhi pana saddhā ca paññā ca samabalā honti. Vīriyañca sayaṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_108: sammappadhānaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā tadubhayaṁ upabrūheti. So ca puggalo tadubhayabalena diṭṭhivicikicchādayo
anya-e0401n8:33_109: pajahitvā kāyasakkhibhāvaṁ pāpuṇāti. Aṭṭhavimokkhe vā uppādetvā ubhatobhāga vimuttabhāvaṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_110: pāpuṇāti. Imesu pana dvīsu puggalesu vīriyassa thāmo suṭṭhu pākaṭo. Tasmā ime dve
anya-e0401n8:33_111: vīriyādhikātveva vattabbā. Na vīriyadhuroti. Catuppaṭipadā nāma dukkhāpaṭipadā dandhābhiññā.
anya-e0401n8:33_112: Dukkhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññā. Sukhāpaṭipadā dandhābhiññā. Sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññā.
anya-e0401n8:33_113: Tividhavimokkho nāma suññato vimokkho. Animitto vimokkho. Appaṇihito vimokkho. ‘‘Tayo
anya-e0401n8:33_114: antarā parinibbāyino’’ti ettha āyukappassa pariyantaṁ apatvā antarā eva kilesaparinibbānapattā
anya-e0401n8:33_115: antarāparinibbāyī nāma. So tividho. Āyukappassa pathamabhāge parinibbāyī, dutīyabhāge,
anya-e0401n8:33_116: tatīyabhāgeti. Ime tayo antarā parinibbāyino nāma. Upahaccaparinibbāyī nāma āyukappa
anya-e0401n8:33_117: pariyante parinibbāyī. Uddhaṁ mukho vaṭṭasoto etassāti uddhaṁsoto. Akaniṭṭhaṁ avassaṁ
anya-e0401n8:33_118: gamissatīti akaniṭṭhagāmī. Vipassanā kammaṁ sasaṅkhāraṁ sappayogaṁ katvā parinibbāyī
anya-e0401n8:33_119: sasaṅkhāra parinibbāyī. Saṅkhārarahitena sukhena vipassanā kammena parinibbāyī asaṅkhāra
anya-e0401n8:33_120: parinibbāyī. ‘‘Dvādasa sotāpannā’’ti ekabījikā tayo. Te eva catūhi paṭipadāhi guṇitā
anya-e0401n8:33_121: dvādasa. Dvādasa sakadāgāmino pubbe vuttanayā eva.
anya-e0401n8:34_0: Ekaccānaṁ eva anāgāmi arahantānaṁ eva. ‘‘Ajjhositassā’’ti adhiositassa. Mamevidanti
anya-e0401n8:34_1: niṭṭhānaṁ katvā ṭhapitassa. Gilitvā ṭhapitassāti vuttaṁ hoti. Bahalena thūlena kāmarāgena
anya-e0401n8:34_2: vimuttā bahalarāgavimuttā. Āruppesu ca tasso arūpasamāpattiyo eva atthi. Na catasso
anya-e0401n8:34_3: rūpasamāpattiyo. Tasmā tattha anupubbanirodho na labbhati. ‘‘Ādito paṭṭhāyā’’ti aṭṭhasu
anya-e0401n8:34_4: samāpattīsu pathamajjhāna samāpattiādi. Tato paṭṭhāya. Anupubbanirodho nāma pathamajjhāne
anya-e0401n8:34_5: paṭighasaññānānattasaññānaṁ nirodho. Paṭighasaññā nāma pañcaviññāṇasaññā. Nānattasaññā
anya-e0401n8:34_6: nāma kasiṇa nimittato aññesu nānārammaṇesu pavattamanoviññāṇa saññā. Dutīyajjhāne
anya-e0401n8:34_7: vitakka vicārānaṁ nirodhotiādinā anupubba nirodho. ‘‘Tato pañcamajjhānaṁ’’ti pañcakanayena
anya-e0401n8:34_8: vuttaṁ. Aṭṭhasamāpatti vacanaṁ pana catukkanayena vuttaṁ. Tadubhayaṁpi puggalānurūpaṁ
anya-e0401n8:34_9: labbhatiyeva. Yuganandhaṁ nāma dvandabandhanaṁ, samathavipassanānaṁ yuganandhanti
anya-e0401n8:34_10: viggaho. ‘‘Samāpajjana vuṭṭhāna vipassanāvasenā’’ti ettha vasibhāvapattaṁ samāpajjanañca
anya-e0401n8:34_11: vuṭṭhānañca gahetabbaṁ. Attano sarīrā baddhesu parikkhāresu samāpattibaleneva antarāyābhāvato
anya-e0401n8:34_12: visuṁ adhiṭṭhātabba kiccaṁ natthīti vuttaṁ ‘‘attano sarīrābaddhe parikkhāre ṭhapetvā’’ti.
anya-e0401n8:34_13: ‘‘Nānābaddhānī’’ti nānāṭhānehi ābaddhāni. Nānāṭhānesu ṭhapitānīti vuttaṁ hoti. ‘‘Parissayenā’’ti
anya-e0401n8:34_14: antarāyena. Māvinassantūti vā nānābaddha avikopanaṁ adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ. Tadā vuṭṭhahāmītivā
anya-e0401n8:34_16: attano jīvitakālassa upaparikkhaṇaṁ. Maraṇañhi nāma samāpattibalenapi paṭibāhituṁ
anya-e0401n8:34_17: na sakkāhoti. Anto samāpattiyañca maraṇe sati sabrahmacārīsu kattabbavattaṁ na kareyya.
anya-e0401n8:34_18: Etañhi vattaṁ yaṁ ariyasāvakānaṁ maraṇāsanne sabrahmacārīnaṁ vā upaṭṭhākānaṁ vā appamādakathānu
anya-e0401n8:34_19: sāsanikammaṁ. Samāpattiyaṁ vā aññatitthiyānaṁ garahā vivajjanatthaṁ. Evañhi te garaheyyuṁ.
anya-e0401n8:34_20: Gotamasāvakānaṁ nirodhasamāpatti nāma ekaṁ maraṇamukhaṁ. Yaṁ samāpajjanto asuko bhikkhu
anya-e0401n8:35_0: ‘‘Yadatthaṁ’’ti paṭipatti rasassādatthaṁ. ‘‘Tadatthe’’ti tasmiṁ atthe. Nirāmisa sukhaṁ
anya-e0401n8:35_1: nāma āmisarahita sukhaṁ. Duvidhañhi sukhaṁ sāmisasukhañca nirāmisasukhañca. Tattha
anya-e0401n8:35_2: ye loke iṭṭha kanta manāpiyā pañcakāmaguṇā nāma atthi. Te kilesehi āmasitabbattā
anya-e0401n8:35_3: āmisā nāma. Yañcasukhaṁ te āmise paṭicca uppajjati, taṁ sāmisasukhaṁ nāma. Yaṁ loke
anya-e0401n8:35_4: dibbaṁ sukhaṁ mānusakaṁ sukhanti mamāyanti. Yañca anubhavantaṁ mahājanaṁ sabbāni
anya-e0401n8:35_5: apāyabhaya vaṭṭabhayāni samparivārenti. Jhānasukha maggasukha phalasukha nibbānasukhaṁ
anya-e0401n8:35_6: pana nirāmisasukhaṁ nāma. Yaṁ nekkhammasukhanti ca pavivekasukhanti ca upasamasukhanti
anya-e0401n8:35_7: ca sambodhisukhanti ca vimuttisukhanti ca ariyasukhanti ca anavajjasukhanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:35_8: Yañca anubhavantaṁ ariyajanaṁ sabbāni apāyabhaya vaṭṭabhayāni samparivajjanti. ‘‘Assāditabbaṭṭhenā’’ti
anya-e0401n8:35_9: kilesapalibodhehi vimuttattā vipula gambhīra santa paṇītarasattā ca ahosukhaṁ ahosukhanti
anya-e0401n8:38_1: āgatena ācārena. ‘‘Ñāti mitta dhana bhogasampattiyā’’ti hetuatthe karaṇavacanaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:38_5: attukkaṁsana paravambhanādi dosehi parisuddhānañca. Naṁ naṁ janaṁ pātirakkhatīti
anya-e0401n8:38_6: nampo. Diṭṭhadiṭṭhesu mettāvihārīti vuttaṁ hoti. Āvhātabboti avhayo. Nāmaṁ. Nampo
anya-e0401n8:38_7: iti avhayo assāti nampavhayoti vacanattho. ‘‘Paṇidhāyā’’ti patthetvāti atthaṁ nivatteti
anya-e0401n8:38_10: janānaṁ vā’’ti. Anukampanaṁ anukampo. Kathaṁ nu kho ime janā abhidhammatthesu sukhena
anya-e0401n8:38_11: ājāneyyunti evaṁ pavatto cittabyāpāro. Atthato anudayasaṅkhātā karuṇāyeva. Tenāha
anya-e0401n8:38_12: ‘‘anudayaṁ kāruññaṁ’’ti. ‘‘Patthitaṁ’’ti vā sādhuvatassa yaṁ thero evarūpaṁ pakaraṇaṁ
anya-e0401n8:38_13: kareyyāti evaṁ cirakālaṁ patthitaṁ āsiṁsitanti attho. ‘‘Khuddasikkhāṭīkāyaṁ’’ti porāṇaṭīkaṁ
anya-e0401n8:38_14: sandhāya vuttaṁ. Somavihārotveva paññāyittha tasmiṁ dīpeti adhippāyo. Gāthāyaṁ ‘‘athā’’ti
anya-e0401n8:38_15: tasmiṁkāle. ‘‘Etthā’’ti etasmiṁ nagare. ‘‘Saddo’’ti kasmā rājā evarūpaṁ maṅgalahatthiṁ
anya-e0401n8:38_16: brāhmaṇānaṁ adāsi. Netaṁ patirūpaṁ yaṁ raññā katanti evaṁ pavatto amanāpasaddo. ‘‘Bheravo’’ti
anya-e0401n8:38_18: vaḍḍhetīti raṭṭhavaḍḍhano. Hatthināgo. So hi lakkhaṇasampanno ājāniyo hoti. Yasmiṁ
anya-e0401n8:38_19: raṭṭhe taṁ abhimaṅgalaṁ karonti, tasmiṁ raṭṭhe devo sammā vassati, nānābhayupaddavā
anya-e0401n8:38_20: tasmiṁ nuppajjantīti lokasammato maṅgalahatthī hoti. Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘sivīnaṁ raṭṭhavaḍḍhane’’ti.
anya-e0401n8:38_21: ‘‘Vitthiṇṇo’’ti vitthārito. Ativitthāroti vuttaṁ hoti. Dhanīyanti mahājanehi daṭṭhuṁ
anya-e0401n8:38_22: patthīyantīti dhaññā. Mahiddhikā. Adhivasanti etthāti adhivāso. Dhaññānaṁ adhivāsoti
anya-e0401n8:38_23: samāso. Ajjhāvasiṁsu etthāti ajjhāvutthaṁ. Kittiguṇavasena udenti uggacchantīti uditā.
anya-e0401n8:38_24: Uditānaṁpi uditoti viggaho. Tenāha ‘‘nabhamajjhe’’tiādiṁ. Sārajjanaṁ sārado. Vigato
anya-e0401n8:38_25: sārado yassāti visārado. Visāradassa bhāvo vesārajjaṁ. Pariyattiyaṁ vesārajjaṁ pariyattivesārajjaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:38_26: Tepiṭakapariyattiyaṁ veyyattiyaññāṇaṁ. Taṁ ādi etissā paññāyāti pariyattivesārajjādi
anya-e0401n8:38_27: paññā. Pāpato lajjanasīlāti lajjinoti āha ‘‘pāpagarahino’’ti. Pāpaṁ dhammaṁ garahantiādīnavaṁ
anya-e0401n8:38_28: kathayanti sīlenāti pāpagarahino. ‘‘Anussarantū’’ti punappunaṁ sarantu. Visesena
anya-e0401n8:38_29: bhavanti vepullaṁ gacchantīti vibhavā. Puññāni ca tāni vibhavācāti puññavibhavā.
anya-e0401n8:38_30: Vipulapuññānīti dassetuṁ ‘‘vipulānaṁ’’tiādimāha. Anuttariya dhammā nāma dassanānuttariya
anya-e0401n8:38_31: savanānuttariyādayo. Loke bahūsu dassanesu ito uttaraṁ aññaṁ dassanaṁ nāma natthīti
anya-e0401n8:38_34: Tesu ratanattayādīsu saddhā paṭilābho lābhānuttariyaṁ nāma. Tesameva punappunaṁ saraṇaṁ
anya-e0401n8:38_35: anussatānuttariyaṁ nāma. Ratanattaye catūhi paccayehi vā vattappaṭivattakaraṇena
anya-e0401n8:38_36: vā paricaraṇaṁ pāricariyānuttariyaṁ nāma. Buddhapaññattāsu tīsu sikkhāsu samādāya
anya-e0401n8:38_37: sikkhanaṁ sikkhānuttariyaṁ nāma. Tādise paññāvadātaguṇasobhādike guṇe avassaṁ bhajanti
anya-e0401n8:38_38: pāpuṇantīti tādisaguṇabhāgino. ‘‘Bhavissāmā’’ti bhavituṁ ussāhaṁ karissāmāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:40_1: dvisaṅkhyāya. Ekañca dukañca suññañca aṭṭhacāti gaṇanakkamo. Sahassa dvisata aṭṭhasaṅkhāte
anya-e0401n8:40_2: sāketi attho. Esanayo parato ‘‘navapañca cammekamhī’’ti padepi. Gāthāvaṇṇanāsu. Nagarati
anya-e0401n8:40_3: na cavatīti nagaraṁ. Thāvariyanti vuttaṁ hoti. ‘‘Rañjetī’’ti rameti. Khemasubhikkhatādiguṇehi
anya-e0401n8:40_4: anāgate jane gamāpeti, āgate aññattha gantuṁ na detīti vuttaṁ hoti. Rohitamigā nāma
anya-e0401n8:40_5: suvaṇṇavaṇṇamigā. ‘‘Sāke’’ti sākanāmena raññā puna saṅkhatattā imaṁ kaliyugaṁ sākanti
anya-e0401n8:40_6: vuccati. Yaṁ etarahi sākrarājantipi voharanti. Sākarājā ca nāma uttarāpathesu eko
anya-e0401n8:40_7: gandhārarājā. Yaṁ jeṭṭhakaṁ katvā bhinnaladdhikā vajjībhikkhū imaṁ dhamma vinayaṁ
anya-e0401n8:40_8: mahāsaṅghīkaṁ nāma saṅgahaṁ āropenti. So ca dhammavinayasaṅgaho uttarāpathesu vattati.
anya-e0401n8:40_9: Vesāliyaṁ yasatthera saṅgaho pana dakkhiṇāpathesūti. Cattāriyugāni nāma loke paññapenti
anya-e0401n8:40_10: satyayugaṁ, dvāparayugaṁ, tetrayugaṁ, kaliyuga,nti. Yuganti ca āyuparimāṇaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:40_11: Idānipana kaliyugaṁ vattati. Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘sāketi kaliyuge’’ti. Pāpayugeti attho.
anya-e0401n8:40_12: ‘‘La tī’’ti sālikkhettānaṁ sodhanaṭṭhānattā evaṁ mrammadesavohārena laddhanāmaṁ araññaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:40_13: Taṁ pana muṁrvānagarassa esanne pañcadhanusatike padese jātaṁ. ‘‘Vissute’’ti visesena
anya-e0401n8:40_14: kittite. Sārañca asārañca vivecenti vicāretvā jānantisīlenāti sārāsāra vivekinoti vacanatthoti.
anya-e0401n8:42: 1. Paramatthadīpanī nāma, yena therena sā katā.
anya-e0401n8:43: Teneve sā katā hoti, ayaṁ tassānu dīpanī.
anya-e0401n8:45: Kāḷe navamiyaṁ divā, majjhanhike niṭṭhaṁ gatā.
